## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G28840](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G28840)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>TIE1</u>
- **Gene Name:** TCP Interactor containing EAR motif protein 1
- **Description:**   mediator of RNA polymerase II transcription subunit;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
